import React from 'react'; import './Modal.css'; import './form.css'; import {useState} from 'react'; function Modal(props) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(false); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(event.target); const data = Object.fromEntries(formData.entries()); document.body.append(data); console.log(data); }; return (

Post A JOB

); } export default Modal;
